product_desc:
*Currently working on product development*

What if your spell check helped treat mental health issues? 

The Boost Media uses the power of our custom lexicon and sentiment analysis integrated with a word detection software to flag and recommend changes to words and phrases proven to worsen the symptoms of depression, anxiety, and other mental health issues commonly diagnosed in university students. 

What can this do for my University or institution? 
Reducing negativity in all communications distributed by an institution over a period of time will neutralize negative feelings and behaviors caused by mental illness in individuals. While gradually working to neutralize negative feelings and behaviors it becomes much easier for existing institution initiatives to affectively promote positive mental health. 

What are the benefits?
Students being treated for mental illness see an increase in GPA, attrition, interpersonal skills, and retention.
high_concept: Big data and sentiment analyis to prevent mental illness
name: The Boost Media
